title: Creating Dronesr
text: article describes process creating dronesr data package. dronesr package created using open access Lens database operated non-profit CAMBIA Australia. WIPO patent analytics team commonly use Lens patent analytics training workshops easy use, provides large scale access data contains important data fields, citations, available elsewhere. article explains process dronesr package built focusing use Lens public interface. start going Lens home page. free Lens account sign one. Lens Database Choose Structured search enter term drone drones figure . Makes sure change predicate default . bottom turn stemmed . Stemmed reduce search term root meaning case get search results terms like droning… don’t want. Note approach search text fields including applicant names may contain term drones. want demonstrate clean data later . also course pretty certain applicant names contain term drone working drone technology. Take time familiarise different search fields title, abstract claims description searching. fields normally focus patent analytics. Conduct patent search stemming turned result search set 101,584 patent documents (applications, grants, search reports ). documents include many republications document (applications, grants, search reports ). therefore want remove duplication focus far possible original filings. purposes choose Simple families. Click simple families. Reduce dataset Simple Families can export 50,000 records Lens, great, 51,177 records. address use Date Range filter limit data publication year start 1990 end 2021 image . Restrict data 1990 2021 brings data 49,243 records. can create collection records Clicking tick mark Patents next Expand choosing Results. selected results see Create Collection icon. click can create collection. create public collection anyone can access. can access collection link . shareable link created choosing Access collection created image . https://www.lens.org/lens/search/patent/list?collectionId=199031 Create Collection collection created position download records. Look Export button results page. see pop box image . Choose 50,000 records optionally give file name. want export .csv format (default). Set Export larger results sets Lens email dataset link . create account able export smaller amount.

text: goal dronesr R data package provide access datasets scientific patent literature drone technology use WIPO training workshops patent analytics. datasets exclusively intended use training deliberately noisy. package consists set datasets scientific literature (lit) set datasets patents (pat) downloaded open access Lens Scholarly Patent Databases using Lens Scholarly Patent APIs. datasets available public collections Lens can interact data. encourage use public collections explore data. patent collection https://www.lens.org/lens/search/patent/list?collectionId=199031 literature collection https://www.lens.org/lens/search/scholar/list?collectionId=199039 understand dronesr datasets created please read article. recommend sign free account Lens. using data packages please ensure provide link Lens credit Lens data. title: Scientific and Patent Datasets on Drones for Analytics Training
text: datasets included package compressed R format can access simply loading library(lensr). However, want use data outside R Python, Tableau tools likely want use csv format versions data. csv copies datasets accessible csv format Open Science Framework project folder https://osf.io/jr87e/. convenience csv files can also downloaded directly package using drones_download() function described . title: Scientific and Patent Datasets on Drones for Analytics Training
text: package consists two core datasets: pat patent dataset 49417 documents mention drones. core dataset patent datasets linking . lit dataset scientific literature mentioning drones 45266 records. datasets package split main sets. case patent (pat) data main split tables : applicants_cleaned inventors_cleaned ipc (international patent classification codes symbols technology areas) patent abstract, patent title pat title nouns text analysis literature (lit) set main split tables present focus text analysis: lit title lit abstract lit title nouns scientific literature patent data operates citation system. Citations take three forms included package. pat_cited. Patents cited core pat set. back citations patent documents shape claimed core set. pat_citing. later filings cite core set. forward citations documents shaped prior art core set. npl. NPL stands non-patent literature means citations literature, websites, manuals etc patent documents. dronesr npl dataset consists scientific literature cited core patent set. linked datasets added due course.

title: Scientific and Patent Datasets on Drones for Analytics Training
text: package includes one function download literature patent datasets Open Science Framework project repository data stored. using R can download csv files follows literature https://osf.io/96w8j/. Click csv icon Download zip. patents https://osf.io/e6h8x/. Click csv icon Download zip. R sets download destination provide. default data download working environment folder called dronesr_data. folder created already exist. hood function uses osfr package drones_download() defaults overwriting existing dronesr_data. See documentation options.
code: library(dronesr)  # download everything drones_download(data = "all", dest = "dronesr_data")  # download literature only  drones_download(data = "lit", dest = "dronesr_data")  # download patent data only  drones_download(data = "pat", dest = "dronesr_data")
